name: Cinnamon Powder
description: Ceylon cinnamon powder blends effortlessly into smoothies, oatmeal, and baked goods. Its sweet, delicate flavor enhances both sweet and savory dishes while offering daily antioxidant support.

name: Cinnamon Oil
description: Ceylon cinnamon oil is a potent extract used for aromatherapy, skincare, and natural wellness. Just a few drops can freshen the air, soothe sore muscles when diluted, or act as a natural antimicrobial in DIY remedies. Its rich, spicy scent energizes the senses and supports overall health.

name: Cinnamon Quills
description: Ceylon cinnamon quills are perfect for infusing warmth and aroma into teas, curries, and desserts. Simply steep in boiling water or add to slow-cooked dishes for a subtle, sweet-spicy flavor and natural health benefits.
